description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mark of the Web security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-38217), follow these steps:

1. Download the relevant KB update for your system version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, use: [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, use: [KB5043083](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083)
2. Install the update through the Windows Update settings or manually execute the downloaded package.
3. Restart your system after installation to apply the updates and mitigate the vulnerability.

**Details**:
- The updates resolve potential security feature bypass issues by reinforcing the Mark of the Web functionality. 
- Ensure that you are downloading the specific updates corresponding to your installed Windows build numbers listed above.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system matches one of the builds mentioned in the detail section.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
